bibl.title: When West Met East. The Encounter of Greece and Rome with the Jews, Egyptians, and Others. Studies Presented to Ranon Katzoff in Honor of his 75th Birthday
bibl.note: Pp. xix: Cassovii Laudes a Dorcade dictae; - xxi-xxv: D.M.S., Ranon Katzoff: A View of Rome from Jerusalem; - xxvii-xxviii: Nachum Cohen, Ranon Katzoff: A Student's View; - xxix-xxx: Hava B. Korzakova, Lo Ba-Shamaim Hi (It is not in Heaven): Professor Ranon Katzoff as a Teacher of Law; - xxxi-xxxv: Ranon Katzoff. A Bibliography; - 3-6: The Editors, Introduction; - 337-360: Index locorum; - 361-372: Index nominum et rerum. - 17 contributions: The Jews and Greco-Roman thought; - The Jews and their own history; - The land of Israel; - The Jews and Greco-Roman law and terminology; - The Romans look at foreigners; - The Egyptians and the Greco-Romans; - The modern world looks at the ancient West and East.
bibl.seg: David M. Schaps, Uri Yiftach & Daniela Dueck (edd.), When West Met East. The Encounter of Greece and Rome with the Jews, Egyptians, and Others. Studies Presented to Ranon Katzoff in Honor of his 75th Birthday = Graeca Tergestina. Storia e Civiltà. 3.
Trieste, Edizioni Università di Trieste, 2016, 8°, xxxvi-372 pp., 1 portrait coul. en front. ISBN 978-88-8303-687-3. €28.

Pp. xix: Cassovii Laudes a Dorcade dictae; - xxi-xxv: D.M.S., Ranon Katzoff: A View of Rome from Jerusalem; - xxvii-xxviii: Nachum Cohen, Ranon Katzoff: A Student's View; - xxix-xxx: Hava B. A Bibliography; - 3-6: The Editors, Introduction; - 337-360: Index locorum; - 361-372: Index nominum et rerum. - 17 contributions: The Jews and Greco-Roman thought; - The Jews and their own history; - The land of Israel; - The Jews and Greco-Roman law and terminology; - The Romans look at foreigners; - The Egyptians and the Greco-Romans; - The modern world looks at the ancient West and East.
